name: AI-driven Food Photography
description: Generate creative and mouthwatering food photography showcasing dishes from various cuisines.

nodes.name: llm
nodes.title: Prompts
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message:
Based on information {{text}} and {{country_name}} write a long prompts for AI to generate image.
Example:
Generate a photorealistic image of a steaming bowl of Khao Soi, a northern Thai curry noodle soup. The soup should be served in a traditional ceramic bowl with yellow curry broth, thick egg noodles, shredded chicken, crispy fried shallots, and a wedge of lime on the rim. Background can be blurred with warm tones suggesting a cozy restaurant setting.

nodes.name: generate_image
nodes.title: Generate Image
nodes.description: Use AI to generate images from your imagination. Simply describe what you want to see, and watch the AI bring it to life.

text.title: Food Name
text.description: The main dish you want a photo of

ui_metadata.value: A steaming bowl of Khao Soi

country_name.title: Country Name
country_name.description: The cultural context and traditional presentation of the food.
